author: Chad Walker
comment: Other than sporting a cube on your wrist this face doesn't really do much. I may have missed it but I don't see a point where I can change it to 12 hour format. I don't care to retrain my brain in order to read my watch.
title: Ok as a nerd declaration

author: Kfir Zax
comment: I wear this watchface 2/3 of the time I wear my watch. My only gripe with this is that it's pretty bland. I want more animations, more colors, make it interactive. Anything that would make this more entertaining.
title: Needs more "content"

author: Dave Combe
comment: This is a simple and yet brilliant watchface. The ambient mode is clear enough to tell the time but the best feature has to be when you wake the screen up. You are greeted with an excellent Rubik's Cube solving animation that ends with presentation of the time. It's a great wee touch that adds nicely to something as simple as showing the time.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Leanne Chandler
comment: At first i couldnt get it to animate but if you turn ambient mode on it works ^^
title: Love it

author: kristian millard
comment: On my moto 360
title: It doesn't work

author: Thiam Sin Lai
comment: The new moto when it turns on, I had to wait for the rotation finish all the time to read time. If possible, can update the app?
title: Need upgrade

author: GRCB LRDB
comment: For some reason it doesnt have the animation on my LG G watch but its still ok
title: LG g watch

comment: Hi cud anybody tell how do I get this app onto my watch please
title: Hi

comment: Don't know how to activate it.

comment: Please add black background.  It will look awesome and I will give 5 star
title: Add black background

comment: Really cute but too much white space around the sides so the font is too small for me

comment: But its never shuffling :(
title: Its cool

comment: Title says it all.
title: Nice looking watchface, but animations don't work

comment: Spins and twists to date and time. Love it
title: Fun to watch

comment: Could you please make a dark version of this? Or a dark mode?

comment: This face is so dope. Thanks
title: Yo!

comment: Please add  am and  pm  indicators

comment: Very cool but what is the trigger for the cube solve animation?
title: Awesome

author: Ashwani Pugla
comment: T
title: T

author: Josh Rose
comment: This watchface is nicely designed, but would benefit from an option to set it to 12-hour rather than 24-hour time display.
title: Great watchface, but needs settings

author: Áron Szabó
comment: Cool little watchface, nice design and animation
title: Why the bad reviews?

author: Edric Ho
comment: What can you expect from a watch face? It works, tells me the time, and gives me a small amount of enjoyment each time I look at my watch.
title: Works well.

author: André Gainey
comment: 12 hr format

author: C English
comment: No option... 1 star!!!!
title: 12 hour option??

author: Gabriel Jimenez
comment: Delightful and fun
title: Fun to watch

author: Connor Payne \the Frozen Doctor/
comment: It's a cool watch face! It's annoying that people are rating it 1-3 stars because of that stupid excuse that it doesn't have 12 hour time. WHO CARES THAT IT DOESN'T HAVE THAT YET? BE THANKFUL THAT THEY ARE MAKING THIS! ITS NOT THE END OF THE WORLD!!!!!!!
title: Noice!!

author: Sam Saludsong
comment: Good watchface,but much ok if you add up a 12hr format and date.I think its possible since you guys are listening to us consumers.Still hoping.😁👌
title: Nice but....

author: George Sapkin
comment: It's great

author: Jordan Tucker
comment: Cool concept, but needs more options, like showing the day of the week. The red face on the left shows nothing when it could be used for something.

author: Israel Méndez
comment: Time numbers are off on Moto360, and no way to tell how to trigger animations (so fat they only show up once, never again to be seen).  No location either, just time and date.

author: Chris Lee-Egan
comment: Appears to be only 24h time, but whatever, I don't have a hangup over it like other reviewers. However, my hang up is that there's an animation every time your watch wakes up, during which you cannot see the current time. This is actually pretty dumb: if you have a screen that dims, this means that you'll briefly see the time, then the watch will wake up because of your wrist motion, then suddenly the time goes away while this animation plays out.

author: Christopher Nash
comment: I like the idea and the way the watch looks, but the alignment of both the time and the date is off on the Moto 360... It also needs and option to change between 24 hour and 12 hour.
title: Fun idea - Alignment is off on moto 360

author: Jason Quick
comment: I really like this watchface, but as others have said, it needs more options like 12hr clock. Also an option to remove the Rubiks branding at the bottom would be nice
title: Great start

author: Anis Charania
comment: Time placement is off on moto 360. Only military time?
title: Off

author: Rob Brown
comment: Is there  a way to change it to a 12 hour clock instead of 24?

author: Adam A
comment: Only support 24h time

author: Son Noelku
comment: Day of week would be nice though
title: Awesome

comment: Quite a fun idea
